This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It was very bright and fixed to one location, within 10 min it seems to be heading west.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home when me and my fiance was studying for an exam for work. and behind him to his left shoulder a bright white light started to shine and i screamed out loud what the hell was that. at first i thought it was a plane but when i realized it was not moving,i quickly ran and grabbed my binoculars to see what it was. it is shaped like a sphere and very ,very bright. it seems to be fixed on one location. my fiance told me to grab my camera and start taking pictures. i took a total of 20 or so pictures. as we speak we are looking at it and it seems to be moving west into the sky. it is currently 8:56pm and it is no longer visable in the sky.
